headline: OpenAI hires veteran Google executive as corporate development VP
summary: OpenAI on Monday confirmed that it has appointed Albert Lee, senior director of ​corporate development at Google, as its vice president ‌of corporate development.  Lee will start his role at Microsoft-backed OpenAI on ‌Tuesday and report to finance chief Sarah Friar.  The goal of bringing Lee "on board is to ensure we have a senior leader with broad visibility across the company ⁠who is empowered to ‌move quickly," an OpenAI spokesperson told Reuters.

headline: FTNT's Premium Valuation Raises Concerns: Buy, Sell or Hold the Stock?
summary: Fortinet's premium valuation, slowing service revenues and cautious guidance offset strong margins and SASE growth, prompting investors to consider a hold stance.

headline: PANW vs. CRWD: Which Cybersecurity Stock Has an Edge Right Now?
summary: CrowdStrike's Falcon Flex surge and faster revenue growth give it the edge over Palo Alto Networks in the battle for cybersecurity dominance.

headline: CrowdStrike Announces the General Availability of Falcon AI Detection and Response to Secure the New AI Attack Surface
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, December 15, 2025--CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) today announced the general availability of Falcon® AI Detection and Response (AIDR), extending the Falcon® platform to secure the fastest-growing attack surface in the AI era: the AI prompt and agent interaction layer. With Falcon AIDR, CrowdStrike delivers the industry’s first unified platform that secures every layer of enterprise AI – data, models, agents, identities, infrastructure, and interactions – from development through work

headline: TimesSquare U.S. Focus Growth Strategy Sold CrowdStrike Holdings (CRWD) Due to Market Cap Considerations
summary: TimesSquare Capital Management, an equity investment management company, released its “U.S. Focus Growth Strategy” third-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the third quarter, all the major asset classes posted positive returns except fixed income assets outside the US. The strategy returned 4.00% (gross) and 3.78% (net) compared […]

headline: Soverli Raises $2.6M Pre-Seed to Bring Secure and Convenient Digital Freedom to Every Smartphone
summary: ETH Zurich spin-off Soverli launches a sovereign OS layer for any commercial smartphone — independent of Android and iOS, yet fully compatible and requiring no hardware changes.Zurich, Dec. 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Digital sovereignty is rapidly becoming one of Europe’s defining geopolitical priorities, driving billions in investment across sovereign cloud, AI, national networks, and next-generation sovereign communication. headline: Expanded AI Alliances With OpenAI and Others Could Be A Game Changer For Accenture (ACN)
summary: In early December 2025, Accenture’s ecosystem partners OpenAI, Anthropic, Snowflake, CrowdStrike, and AWS announced expanded collaborations with Accenture to scale enterprise AI deployment, cloud data platforms, and modern security operations, including new joint business groups, large-scale AI training programs, and co-developed solutions for regulated industries. These moves collectively position Accenture as a central implementation and integration partner for advanced AI and cloud...
